DataElement.preferredName: Adolescent Three Day Physical Activity Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours. This also refers to a specific day. (NCI)_Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adolescent Three Day Physical Activity Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours. This also refers to a specific day. (NCI)_Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A juvenile between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of juveniles between the onset of puberty and maturity; in the state of development between puberty and maturity.

Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm):Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
